title: CGS Card Game Specification - Cards
description: Lists out Card information. You should have at least 1 of either AllCards.json or AllSets.json. You may have both, and if you have both, CGS will combine the data from both to use in-game.

$cgs.json/properties/cardSetIdentifier.description: The code for the Card's Set

backs.description: List of backs for the Card. If blank, the default CardBackImage is used. If populated, each back must correspond to an id in <cardBackFaceImageUrls>. The empty string corresponds to the default CardBackImage.
